Lex

Developer | Marketer | Writer | Human

Learn More

"If you are lucky enough to be born
with the freedom to make your own decisions,
it is your responsibility to
do work that matters."

I help people make a positive change in the world with
words, code, and smart businesses.

Full-stack Developer

I'm an entirely self-taught Ruby on Rails developer and my buzz comes from shipping products that solve real-world problems. I lean slightly more towards front-end than back-end but enjoy flipping from left to right brain thinking as needed.

Full-funnel Marketer

For over 5 years I've built up a knowledge of every shade of digital marketing: content marketing, paid advertising, organic marketing, automation, analytics, and sales attribution models.

Writer

I geek out over all kinds of words whether they're in email funnels, ads, websites, articles, social media or books. By day, I share personal revelations and learnings for future humans on Zenbeard.com.

Human

If I'm not tapping keys, I teach rock-climbing, practice calisthenics, explore movement sports, and cook. People say nice things about my Pumpkin Risotto. I hope you can try it someday.
